Text:
This was a great movie. I'm happy to see more and more adult studios returning to having actual stories like in the golden 70's and 80's.

Also wanted to comment on the lead male Manuel Ferrara, believe it or not. He seems to be an expert of making the women have a good time. If the women he had sex with here didn't have several real orgasms while he did them, they were truly great actors.

Thanks for the up!
